txt.en: 'Are you ready to ride to the Whitshaws? The Warg-packs await your vengeance!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The Warg-infested area of the Whitshaws can be reached by speaking with Dudoc in Forlaw.\n\nYou should travel to the plains of the Whitshaws and defeat Warg-packs there.
'You did well today, [placeholder]. Wargs are vicious, cruel animals, and have no business roaming the lands of Wildermore.'
Dudoc is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Dudoc.
'Hail, [placeholder]! I hope you are feeling up for a bit of battle today.\n\n'Wargs roam the lake's edge in the Whitshaws, great packs of them, and they must be stopped.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Warg-packs have moved onto the lake's edge of the Whitshaws, killing the moose that roam there.
